TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OleDbDataReader extends System.Data.Common.DbDataReader
Public NotInheritable Class OleDbDataReader Inherits DbDataReader
public ref class OleDbDataReader sealed : System::Data::Common::DbDataReader

summary.span: 提供从数据源读取数据行的只进流的方法。

span.span: Provides a way of reading a forward-only stream of data rows from a data source.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要创建，必须调用方法对象，而不是直接使用构造函数。To create an , you must call the method of the object, instead of directly using a constructor. 在关闭之前，先关闭对象。Before you close the , first close the object. 您必须关闭对象如果你计划重新对象。例如，无法检索输出参数，直到调用之后。You must also close the object if you plan to resuse an object.For example, you cannot retrieve output parameters until after you call . 对一个结果集由另一个进程或线程，在读取数据时所做的更改可能会对用户可见。Changes made to a result set by another process or thread while data is being read may be visible to the user of the . 但是，确切的行为与执行时间有关。However, the precise behavior is timing dependent. 和是可以后调用的唯一属性已关闭。 and are the only properties that you can call after the is closed. 尽管可能访问属性时存在，始终调用在返回的值之前若要确保返回精确的值。Although the property may be accessed while the exists, always call before returning the value of to guarantee an accurate return value. ## Examples 下面的示例创建、 ，和。The following example creates an , an , and an . 该示例读取到的数据，写出到控制台。The example reads through the data, writing it out to the console. 最后，该示例关闭然后。Finally, the example closes the and then the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbDataReader Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbDataReader Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbDataReader Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbDataReader Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 关闭 对象。

span.span: Closes the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你必须明确地调用方法时通过使用用于关联用于任何其他用途。You must explicitly call the method when you are through using the to use the associated for any other purpose. > [!CAUTION] > 不要调用**关闭**或**释放**连接、 DataReader 或在任何其他托管的对象上**Finalize**你类的方法。Do not call **Close** or **Dispose** on a Connection, a DataReader, or any other managed object in the **Finalize** method of your class. 在终结器中，你应仅释放类直接拥有的非托管的资源。In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly. 如果你的类不拥有任何非托管的资源，不包括**Finalize**在类定义的方法。If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a **Finalize** method in your class definition. 有关详细信息，请参阅[垃圾回收](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/22b6cb97-0c80-4eeb-a2cf-5ed7655e37f9)。For more information, see [Garbage Collection](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/22b6cb97-0c80-4eeb-a2cf-5ed7655e37f9). ## Examples 下面的示例创建、 ，和。The following example creates an , an , and an . 该示例读取到的数据，写出到控制台。The example reads through the data, writing it out to the console. 最后，该示例关闭，，然后。Finally, the example closes the , and then the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData IDataReader.Read Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData IDataReader.Read Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData IDataReader.Read Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData IDataReader.Read Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取当前行中的列数。

span.span: Gets the number of columns in the current row.

span.span: When not positioned in a valid recordset, 0; otherwise the number of columns in the current record.
The default is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包括隐藏的字段。Includes hidden fields. 使用 可排除隐藏的字段。Use to exclude hidden fields. 之后执行的查询不返回行，返回 0。After executing a query that does not return rows, returns 0.

MemberSignature.Value: public override long GetBytes (int ordinal, long dataIndex, byte[] buffer, int bufferIndex, int length);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int64 GetBytes(int32 ordinal, int64 dataIndex, unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 bufferIndex, int32 length) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetBytes (ordinal As Integer, dataIndex As Long, buffer As Byte(), bufferIndex As Integer, length As Integer) As Long
public: override long GetBytes(int ordinal, long dataIndex, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int bufferIndex, int length);

span.span: The zero-based column ordinal.

param.name: dataIndex
param.span: 字段中作为读取操作起始位置的索引。

span.span: The index within the field from which to start the read operation.

param.name: buffer
param.span: 要读入字节流的缓冲区。

span.span: The buffer into which to read the stream of bytes.

param.name: bufferIndex
param.span: buffer 中写入操作开始位置的索引。

span.span: The index within the buffer where the write operation is to start.

param.name: length
param.span: 复制到缓冲区中的最大长度。

span.span: The maximum length to copy into the buffer.

summary.span: 从按指定的列偏移量将字节流作为数组从给定的缓冲区偏移量开始读入缓冲区。

span.span: Reads a stream of bytes from the specified column offset into the buffer as an array starting at the given buffer offset.
The actual number of bytes read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的字段中的可用字节数。 returns the number of available bytes in the field. 大多数情况下这是字段的确切长度。Most of the time this is the exact length of the field. 但是，返回的版本号可能会小于该字段的真实长度如果`GetBytes`具有用于从字段中获取字节。However, the number returned may be less than the true length of the field if `GetBytes` has already been used to obtain bytes from the field. 这可能是这种情况，例如，当正在读取到缓冲区中的大型数据结构。This may be the case, for example, when the is reading a large data structure into a buffer. 有关详细信息，请参阅`SequentialAccess`设置。For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting for . 如果传递的缓冲区，则`null`，返回字段的长度以字节为单位。If you pass a buffer that is `null`, returns the length of the field in bytes. 不进行任何转换;因此，检索的数据必须已经是字节数组。No conversions are performed; therefore, the data retrieved must already be a byte array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的字段中的可用的字符数。 returns the number of available characters in the field. 大多数情况下这是字段的确切长度。Most of the time this is the exact length of the field. 但是，返回的版本号可能会小于该字段的真实长度如果`GetChars`具有用于从字段中获取字符。However, the number returned may be less than the true length of the field if `GetChars` has already been used to obtain characters from the field. 这可能是这种情况，例如，当正在读取到缓冲区中的大型数据结构。This may be the case, for example, when the is reading a large data structure into a buffer. 有关详细信息，请参阅`SequentialAccess`设置。For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting for . 如果传递的缓冲区，则`null`，以字符为单位返回字段的长度。If you pass a buffer that is `null`, returns the length of the field in characters. 不进行任何转换;因此，检索的数据必须已经是字符数组。No conversions are performed; therefore, the data retrieved must already be a character array.

summary.span: 在给定列名时获取相应的列序号。

span.span: Gets the column ordinal, given the name of the column.
The zero-based column ordinal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 第一次执行区分大小写的查找。 performs a case-sensitive lookup first. 如果失败，进行第二个的不区分大小写搜索。If it fails, a second case-insensitive search is made. 该方法将引发`IndexOutOfRange`exceptionif 找不到的从零开始的列序号。The method throws an `IndexOutOfRange` exceptionif the zero-based column ordinal is not found. 不区分假名宽度。 is kana-width insensitive. 由于基于序号的查找，比命名查找更为有效，它是效率不高调用在循环中。Because ordinal-based lookups are more efficient than named lookups, it is inefficient to call within a loop. 通过调用来节省时间一次并将结果分配给在循环内使用一个整数变量。Save time by calling one time and assigning the results to an integer variable for use within the loop. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法。The following example demonstrates how to use the method. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbDataReader.GetOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbDataReader.GetOrdinal/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbDataReader.GetOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbDataReader.GetOrdinal/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 指定的名称不是有效的列名。

span.span: The name specified is not a valid column name.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Data.DataTable GetSchemaTable ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable GetSchemaTable() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetSchemaTable () As DataTable
public: override System::Data::DataTable ^ GetSchemaTable();

summary.span: 返回一个描述 的列元数据的 。

span.span: Returns a that describes the column metadata of the .
A that describes the column metadata.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法映射到 OLE DB **IColumnsRowset::GetColumnsRowset**方法，并返回有关按以下顺序的每个列的元数据：The method maps to the OLE DB **IColumnsRowset::GetColumnsRowset** method, and returns metadata about each column in the following order: |DataReader 列DataReader column|OLE DB 列 IDOLE DB column ID|描述Description| |-----------------------|----------------------|-----------------| |列名ColumnName|DBCOLUMN_NAMEDBCOLUMN_NAME|列; 的名称这可能不是唯一的。The name of the column; this might not be unique. 如果无法确定该名称，则返回 null 值。If this cannot be determined, a null value is returned. 此名称始终反映最新的当前视图或命令文本中的列重命名。This name always reflects the most recent renaming of the column in the current view or command text.| |ColumnOrdinalColumnOrdinal|DBCOLUMN_NUMBERDBCOLUMN_NUMBER|从零开始的列序号。The zero-based ordinal of the column. 此列不能包含 null 值。This column cannot contain a null value.| |ColumnSizeColumnSize|DBCOLUMN_COLUMNSIZEDBCOLUMN_COLUMNSIZE|列中值的最大可取长度。The maximum possible length of a value in the column. 对于使用固定长度的数据类型的列，这是数据类型的大小。For columns that use a fixed-length data type, this is the size of the data type.| |NumericPrecisionNumericPrecision|DBCOLUMN_PRECISIONDBCOLUMN_PRECISION|如果 DbType 是数值数据类型，这是列的最大精度。If DbType is a numeric data type, this is the maximum precision of the column. 带 DBTYPE_DECIMAL 或 DBTYPE_NUMERIC 的数据类型的列的精度取决于列的定义。The precision of columns with a data type of DBTYPE_DECIMAL or DBTYPE_NUMERIC depends on the definition of the column. 如果 DbType 不是数值数据类型，这是一个 null 值。If DbType is not a numeric data type, this is a null value.| |NumericScaleNumericScale|DBCOLUMN_SCALEDBCOLUMN_SCALE|如果 DbType DBTYPE_DECIMAL 或 DBTYPE_NUMERIC，这是小数点右侧的数字个数。If DbType is DBTYPE_DECIMAL or DBTYPE_NUMERIC, this is the number of digits to the right of the decimal point. 否则，这是一个 null 值。Otherwise, this is a null value.| |数据类型DataType|无None|映射到列的.NET Framework 类型。Maps to the .NET Framework type of the column.| |ProviderTypeProviderType|DBCOLUMN_TYPEDBCOLUMN_TYPE|列的数据类型的指示符。The indicator of the column's data type. 如果列的数据类型会从行至行发生变化，这必须是 DBTYPE_VARIANT。If the data type of the column varies from row to row, this must be DBTYPE_VARIANT. 此列不能包含 null 值。This column cannot contain a null value.| |IsLongIsLong|DBCOLUMNFLAGS_ISLONGDBCOLUMNFLAGS_ISLONG|提供程序设置 DBCOLUMNFLAGS_ISLONG，如果列包含二进制长对象 (BLOB) 包含很长的数据。The provider sets DBCOLUMNFLAGS_ISLONG if the column contains a Binary Long Object (BLOB) that contains very long data. 很长的数据的定义是特定于提供程序。The definition of very long data is provider-specific. 此标志的设置中的数据类型 PROVIDER_TYPES 行集的 IS_LONG 列的值相对应。The setting of this flag corresponds to the value of the IS_LONG column in the PROVIDER_TYPES rowset for the data type.| |AllowDBNullAllowDBNull|DBCOLUMNFLAGS_ISNULLABLEDBCOLUMNFLAGS_ISNULLABLE|提供程序设置 DBCOLUMNFLAGS_ISNULLABLE，如果使用者可以将列设置为 null 值，或提供程序无法确定使用者是否可以将列设置为 null 值。The provider sets DBCOLUMNFLAGS_ISNULLABLE if the consumer can set the column to a null value, or if the provider cannot determine whether the consumer can set the column to a null value. 列可能包含 null 值，即使它不能设置为 null 值。A column may contain null values, even if it cannot be set to a null value.| |为只读IsReadOnly|DBCOLUMNFLAGS_WRITEDBCOLUMNFLAGS_WRITE|`true` 如果列不能更改;否则为`false`。`true` if the column cannot be modified; otherwise `false`. 列被假定为提供程序已设置的 DBCOLUMNFLAGS_WRITE 或 DBCOLUMNFLAGS_WRITEUNKNOWN 标志的情况下可写。The column is assumed to be writable if the provider has set either the DBCOLUMNFLAGS_WRITE or DBCOLUMNFLAGS_WRITEUNKNOWN flag.| |IsRowVersionIsRowVersion|DBCOLUMNFLAGS_ISROWIDDBCOLUMNFLAGS_ISROWID|提供程序设置 DBCOLUMNFLAGS_ISROWID，如果列包含一个持久性行标识符，它无法写入到，并标识行除外没有有意义的值。The provider sets DBCOLUMNFLAGS_ISROWID if the column contains a persistent row identifier that cannot be written to, and has no meaningful value except to identity the row.| |IsUniqueIsUnique|DBCOLUMN_ISUNIQUEDBCOLUMN_ISUNIQUE|VARIANT_TRUE: 基表中表中 BaseTableName 可以返回两行都不在此列中具有相同的值。VARIANT_TRUE: No two rows in the base table-the table returned in BaseTableName-can have the same value in this column. 本身，或者如果没有类型仅适用于此列的 UNIQUE 约束的情况下，是唯一的保证是 VARIANT_TRUE 如果列表示一个密钥。IsUnique is guaranteed to be VARIANT_TRUE if the column represents a key by itself or if there is a constraint of type UNIQUE that applies only to this column.

VARIANT_FALSE: 列可以包含基表中的重复值。VARIANT_FALSE: The column can contain duplicate values in the base table. 此列的默认值为 VARIANT_FALSE。The default of this column is VARIANT_FALSE.| |IsKeyIsKey|DBCOLUMN_KEYCOLUMNDBCOLUMN_KEYCOLUMN|VARIANT_TRUE: 列是一组的行集中的列，合在一起，唯一标识该行。VARIANT_TRUE: The column is one of a set of columns in the rowset that, taken together, uniquely identify the row. 具有设置为 VARIANT_TRUE IsKey 的列集必须唯一标识行集中的行。The set of columns with IsKey set to VARIANT_TRUE must uniquely identify a row in the rowset. 没有任何要求此列集是列的最小集。There is no requirement that this set of columns is a minimal set of columns. 此列集可能会生成从基表的主键、 唯一约束或唯一索引。This set of columns may be generated from a base table primary key, a unique constraint or a unique index.

VARIANT_FALSE: 列不需要唯一标识行。VARIANT_FALSE: The column is not required to uniquely identify the row.| |IsAutoIncrementIsAutoIncrement|DBCOLUMN_ISAUTOINCREMENTDBCOLUMN_ISAUTOINCREMENT|VARIANT_TRUE: 列将值分配给新行以固定的增量。VARIANT_TRUE: The column assigns values to new rows in fixed increments.

VARIANT_FALSE: 列不会以固定的增量向新行分配值。VARIANT_FALSE: The column does not assign values to new rows in fixed increments. 此列的默认值为 VARIANT_FALSE。The default of this column is VARIANT_FALSE.| |BaseSchemaNameBaseSchemaName|DBCOLUMN_BASESCHEMANAMEDBCOLUMN_BASESCHEMANAME|中包含的列的数据存储的架构的名称。The name of the schema in the data store that contains the column. 如果无法确定基础架构名称，null 值。A null value if the base schema name cannot be determined. 此列的默认值为 null 值。The default of this column is a null value.| |BaseCatalogNameBaseCatalogName|DBCOLUMN_BASECATALOGNAMEDBCOLUMN_BASECATALOGNAME|包含的列的数据存储区中目录的名称。The name of the catalog in the data store that contains the column. 如果无法确定基目录名称，null 值。A null value if the base catalog name cannot be determined. 此列的默认值为 null 值。The default of this column is a null value.| |BaseTableNameBaseTableName|DBCOLUMN_BASETABLENAMEDBCOLUMN_BASETABLENAME|表或视图中包含的列的数据存储区的名称。The name of the table or view in the data store that contains the column. 如果基表名称不能确定，null 值。A null value if the base table name cannot be determined. 此列的默认值为 null 值。The default of this column is a null value.| |BaseColumnNameBaseColumnName|DBCOLUMN_BASECOLUMNNAMEDBCOLUMN_BASECOLUMNNAME|数据存储区中列的名称。The name of the column in the data store. 这可能是不同于返回 ColumnName 列中，如果使用了别名的列名称。This might be different from the column name returned in the ColumnName column if an alias was used. 如果无法确定基列名称，或者如果派生的但并不完全相同，则行集列，数据中的列存储一个 null 值。A null value if the base column name cannot be determined or if the rowset column is derived, but not identical to, a column in the data store. 此列的默认值为 null 值。The default of this column is a null value.| > [!NOTE] > 若要确保元数据列返回正确的信息，必须调用与`behavior`参数设置为`KeyInfo`。To make sure that metadata columns return the correct information, you must call with the `behavior` parameter set to `KeyInfo`. 否则，一些架构表中的列可能返回默认情况下，null，或不正确的数据。Otherwise, some of the columns in the schema table may return default, null, or incorrect data.

param.name: values
param.span: 要将属性列复制到的 数组。

span.span: An array of into which to copy the attribute columns.

summary.span: 使用当前行的列值来填充对象数组。

span.span: Populates an array of objects with the column values of the current row.
The number of instances of in the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于大多数应用程序，方法提供了高效地检索所有列，而不是单独都检索每个列。For most applications, the method provides an efficient means for retrieving all columns, instead of retrieving each column individually. 你可以将传递数组，其中包含的结果行中包含的列数少于。You can pass an array that contains fewer than the number of columns that are contained in the resulting row. 数据量数组包含复制到数组。Only the amount of data the array holds is copied to the array. 你还可以传递其长度是多个结果行中包含的列数的数组。You can also pass an array whose length is more than the number of columns that are contained in the resulting row. 对于 null 数据库列，此方法返回 。This method returns for null database columns. ## Examples [!code-csharp[OleDbDataReader_GetValues#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/oledbdatareader_getvalues/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[OleDbDataReader_GetValues#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/oledbdatareader_getvalues/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认位置之前第一条记录。The default position of the is before the first record. 因此，必须调用来开始访问任何数据。Therefore, you must call to start accessing any data. 虽然正在使用中，关联正忙于为服务它直到你调用。While the is being used, the associated is busy serving it until you call . ## Examples 下面的示例创建、 ，和。The following example creates an , an , and an . 该示例读取到的数据，写出到控制台。The example reads through the data, writing it out to the console. 最后，该示例关闭然后。Finally, the example closes the and then the . span.span: The number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted; 0 if no rows were affected or the statement failed; and -1 for SELECT statements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 读取了所有行并在关闭之前，未设置属性。The property is not set until all rows are read and you close the . 此属性的值是累积的。The value of this property is cumulative. 例如，如果两条记录插入在批处理模式下，值是两个。For example, if two records are inserted in batch mode, the value of is two. 和是可以后调用的唯一属性已关闭。 and are the only properties that you can call after the is closed.

summary.span: 获取 中未隐藏的字段的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of fields in the that are not hidden.
The number of fields that are not hidden.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值用于确定 中的可见字段的数目。This value is used to determine how many fields in the are visible. 例如，对分部主键执行 SELECT 将以隐藏字段的形式返回该键的其余部分。For example, a SELECT on a partial primary key returns the remaining parts of the key as hidden fields. 隐藏的字段始终追加在可见字段之后。The hidden fields are always appended behind the visible fields.
